cookingTips: Watch the butter carefully as it browns to avoid burning completely; stop when it becomes fragrant and nutty
Cool the browned butter before mixing with other ingredients to prevent the frosting from becoming greasy
Sift the powdered sugar to eliminate lumps for a smooth, spreadable frosting
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Teach the distinction between browning and burning butter. Guide on achieving the nutty flavor while maintaining the right consistency for frosting.
